ctx: intros n R A B H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (RepresentableHalfHelp n R A); apply (RepresentableHalf2Alternate n R (iffH A B)).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat R : naryRel n A, B : Formula H1 : SysPrf T (iffH A B) H2 : ExpressibleHelp n R A The term "R" has type "naryRel n" while it is expected to have type "naryFunc n".

ctx: intros n R A B H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (iffE2 T (iffH A B) (iffH B A) H1), (iffSym T A B H2).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat R : naryRel n A, B : Formula H1 : SysPrf T (iffH A B) H2 : ExpressibleHelp n R A The term "H1" has type "SysPrf T (iffH A B)" while it is expected to have type "SysPrf T (iffH (iffH A B) (iffH B A))".

ctx: intros n R A B H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (iffE1 T (iffH A B) (iffH B A) H1), H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat R : naryRel n A, B : Formula H1 : SysPrf T (iffH A B) H2 : ExpressibleHelp n R A The term "H1" has type "SysPrf T (iffH A B)" while it is expected to have type "SysPrf T (iffH (iffH A B) (iffH B A))".

original: intros n R A B H1 H2. apply (RepresentableHalfHelp n R A); apply (RepresentableHalf2Alternate n R (iffH A B)). - apply (iffE2 T (iffH A B) (iffH B A) H1), (iffSym T A B H2). - apply (iffE1 T (iffH A B) (iffH B A) H1), H2.
